thread.title: Khan's trainer for 'Sultan' staying at his Panvel farmhouse?
thread.title_full: Salman Khan's trainer for 'Sultan' staying at his Panvel farmhouse? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Khan's trainer for 'Sultan' staying at his Panvel farmhouse?
text:
Salman Khan has started prepping up for his wrestler role in Sultan under the supervision of international fight choreographer Larnell Stovall. And if sources are to be believed, the star is hosting the beefy trainer at his Panvel farmhouse.*Salman Khan (right) trains for Sultan*
"Salman has been staying at his farmhouse for ... Â»
